Hari,

There's no default way I know of.  Is your goal to fail more quickly=

if a lot of tests are failing, or to pass even with some tests
failing?  I=
n my experience, number of failures doesn't have a great
correlation with a=
ny inutitive definition of "brokenness".  Is your
experience different?

  =
 David

rote:
